Package application

Class Date

java.lang.Object
application.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This is the Date class represents a date. It holds the logic for getting and setting variables in the Date class.
Author:
Kiernan King and Ahmed Alghazwi
